about_the_game:
Welcome to beautiful Kazera! In this retro-inspired RPG demo, play as Starknight Razizal and blast through 5 airships full of enemies, traps, cannons and secrets. Destroy the ships at your leisure, or go straight for the boss, play however you like!

Practice mode also included to explain battle overview.

===================================================

Features:

*Play either the Airship stage or practice mode.

*Equip up to 4 skills to use in battle. Each skill has advantages and disadvantages such as raising or lowing stats.

*There is no MP! Battle revolves around the EX gauge, inspired by the fighting game genre. Attack or successfully avoid attacks to build meter and defeat your foes.

*1 playable character only in this demo. (Full game will have max party of 3).

*Chiptune music by Lintilion. I made him make a million tracks for this game! (@lintilion on Twitter, please support him)

Controls:

ARROW KEYS - move/navigate menus/Arrow Minigames in battles

ENTER - Select/Grab/Mash Battle QTE

SHIFT - Hold to dash on Map/In battle, depending on the warning indicator, either press once to jump and avoid attacks or hold and release to counter incoming attacks.

C- Jump (Map)

SPACE - Shoot

X - Exit menu/Open Menu on Map

ALT - Skip text boxes

MOUSE CONTROLS: Left Click - select, Right Click - exit

Mouse can be used to select enemies in battle. If not using mouse controls and you notice something is wrong, check that the mouse cursor isn't hovering over an enemy.
